doc.description:
DB Interface


These methods have to be implemented on both database and query.
Most methods usable on query should be also usable directly through database, which will create the query apply its method.

name: bbn\Db\Actions

getRow.name: getRow
getRow.summary: Fetches the database and returns an array of a single row text-indexed

getRows.name: getRows
getRows.summary: Fetches the database and returns an array of several arrays of rows text-indexed

getIrow.name: getIrow
getIrow.summary: Fetches the database and returns an array of a single row num-indexed

getIrows.name: getIrows
getIrows.summary: Fetches the database and returns an array of several arrays of rows num-indexed

getByColumns.name: getByColumns
getByColumns.summary: Fetches the database and returns an array of arrays, one per column, each having each column's values

getObj.name: getObj
getObj.summary: Fetches the database and returns an object of a single row, alias of get_object

getObject.name: getObject
getObject.summary: Fetches the database and returns an object of a single row

getObjects.name: getObjects
getObjects.summary: Fetches the database and returns an array of objects

description:
These methods have to be implemented on both database and query.
Most methods usable on query should be also usable directly through database, which will create the query apply its method.

description_parts.content: These methods have to be implemented on both database and query. Most methods usable on query should be also usable directly through database, which will create the query apply its method.
